duties_responsibilities.duty: Creating a warm and inviting atmosphere for members and visitors to create a strong sense of authentic community.
Running the daily operations of a hygge location, including ordering supplies, maintaining community orderliness, and engaging with members.
Developing and implementing outreach strategies, creating and implementing engaging member events, and coordinating & hosting meetings and events.
Managing non-profit and start-up scholarships, maintaining a strong presence in the community, and building relationships to foster member growth.
Daily operations tasks such as opening/closing, answering phones, welcoming/greeting members & visitors, and managing email inquiries/incoming leads.
Conducting tours for new member sign-ups, managing member invoices, payments, and customer experience.
Maintaining a local presence, participating in volunteer activities, and providing weekly emails to members on events and opportunities.
Assisting with facilitating corporate offsite meetings/events, catering set up/clean up, and maintaining beverage service throughout the day.
Providing the best-in-class service for all meeting and event guests, as well as handling cleaning and reset of meeting spaces for the following day.
Evening and weekend hours may be required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Management or a related field (Master's preferred)
